description.zh-cn: 英国籍华人作家，原名张二鸿。其著作多为传记，主题围绕中国。她是中华人民共和国建国后首位获得英国大学博士学位的中国公民。
description.en: A British Chinese writer, formerly known as Zhang Erhong. Her works are mostly biographies focusing on China. She is the first citizen of the People's Republic of China to receive a doctorate from a British university after its founding.

description.zh-cn: 英国历史学家，张戎的丈夫，与她合著了《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》。
description.en: British historian, husband of Jung Chang, with whom he co-authored 'Mao: The Unknown Story'.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省下辖的地级市，张戎的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province, China, the birthplace of Jung Chang.

description.zh-cn: 英国首都，张戎的现居地。
description.en: Capital of the United Kingdom, the current residence of Jung Chang.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府军事将领，张戎的外祖父。
description.en: A military general of the Nationalist government, maternal grandfather of Jung Chang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场政治运动，张戎在此期间曾是红卫兵、农民、赤脚医生、翻砂工、电工。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Jung Chang was a Red Guard, peasant, barefoot doctor, sand caster, and electrician.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期的群众组织，张戎曾是其中一员。
description.en: A mass organization during the Cultural Revolution, of which Jung Chang was a member.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国成都的大学，张戎曾在此就读并任教。
description.en: A university in Chengdu, China, where Jung Chang studied and taught.

description.zh-cn: 中国文化大革命时期经推荐进入大学学习的青年学生群体，张戎曾是其中一员。
description.en: A group of young students recommended for university studies during the Chinese Cultural Revolution, of which Jung Chang was a member.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国约克的大学，张戎在此取得博士学位。
description.en: A university in York, England, where Jung Chang obtained her doctorate.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia.

nodes.id: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

zh-cn: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 由张戎与丈夫乔·哈利戴合著的关于毛泽东的传记。
description.en: A biography of Mao Zedong co-authored by Jung Chang and her husband Jon Halliday.

nodes.id: 鸿：三代中国女人的故事

zh-cn: 鸿：三代中国女人的故事
en: Wild Swans: Three Daughters of China

description.zh-cn: 张戎的自传作品。
description.en: Jung Chang's autobiographical work.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的公立大学，张戎是其校友。
description.en: A public university in London, UK, of which Jung Chang is an alumna.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的公立研究型大学，张戎曾在此任教。
description.en: A public research university in London, UK, where Jung Chang taught.

nodes.id: 宋氏三姊妹与她们的丈夫

zh-cn: 宋氏三姊妹与她们的丈夫
en: Big Sister, Little Sister, Red Sister

description.zh-cn: 张戎创作的传记作品。
description.en: A biographical work by Jung Chang.

nodes.id: 慈禧：开启现代中国的皇太后

zh-cn: 慈禧：开启现代中国的皇太后
en: Empress Dowager Cixi: The Concubine Who Launched Modern China

description.zh-cn: 张戎创作的关于慈禧太后的传记。
description.en: A biography of Empress Dowager Cixi by Jung Chang.

description.zh-cn: 张戎创作的关于宋庆龄的传记。
description.en: A biography of Soong Ching-ling by Jung Chang.

description.zh-cn: 张戎于1991年与乔·哈利戴结婚。
description.en: Jung Chang married Jon Halliday in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 张戎出生于四川省宜宾市。
description.en: Jung Chang was born in Yibin, Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 薛之珩是张戎的外祖父。
description.en: Xue Zhiheng is Jung Chang's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，张戎曾担任红卫兵、农民、赤脚医生、翻砂工和电工。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Jung Chang served as a Red Guard, peasant, barefoot doctor, sand caster, and electrician.

description.zh-cn: 张戎在文革期间曾是红卫兵。
description.en: Jung Chang was a Red Guard during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，张戎进入四川大学外语系成为工农兵大学生。
description.en: In 1973, Jung Chang entered the Department of Foreign Languages at Sichuan University as a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student.

description.zh-cn: 张戎从四川大学毕业后留校任教。
description.en: After graduating from Sichuan University, Jung Chang stayed on to teach.

description.zh-cn: 张戎于1973年成为一名工农兵大学生。
description.en: Jung Chang became a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 张戎在英国约克大学取得博士学位。
description.en: Jung Chang obtained her PhD from the University of York in the UK.

relationships.target: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 与丈夫乔·哈利戴合著该书。
description.en: Co-authored the book with her husband Jon Halliday.

relationships.target: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 与妻子张戎合著该书。
description.en: Co-authored the book with his wife Jung Chang.

relationships.target: 鸿：三代中国女人的故事

description.zh-cn: 创作了自传《鸿：三代中国女人的故事》。
description.en: Authored the autobiography 'Wild Swans: Three Daughters of China'.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，张戎是西伦敦大学的校友。
description.en: According to category information, Jung Chang is an alumna of the University of West London.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，张戎曾是伦敦大学亚非学院的教师。
description.en: According to category information, Jung Chang was a teacher at SOAS University of London.

relationships.target: 宋氏三姊妹与她们的丈夫

description.zh-cn: 于2019年出版了传记《宋氏三姊妹与她们的丈夫》。
description.en: Published the biography 'Big Sister, Little Sister, Red Sister' in 2019.

relationships.target: 慈禧：开启现代中国的皇太后

description.zh-cn: 于2013年出版了传记《慈禧：开启现代中国的皇太后》。
description.en: Published the biography 'Empress Dowager Cixi: The Concubine Who Launched Modern China' in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 于1986年出版了传记《孙逸仙夫人宋庆龄传》。
description.en: Published the biography 'Madame Sun Yat-sen: Soong Ching-ling' in 1986.
